name: Blitzalic
description:
April 2011

Simple reflex game programmed in Visual Basic from my highschool years.

"GOOD COMING TO BLITZALIC

You are trapped as a result of Haipasupesuwamuhoru, has become forever lost in the darkness of space. Desire to return to your family than anything, your personal set F-312 Please seekers to find them in space. Along the way, encounter hostile people set out to destroy your hopes and dreams! Before they catch you, to accelerate through space, please click on them. It is the only salvation!"
